day_summary.title: Day 2 Recitation Summary (Al-Baqarah 142-251)
day_summary.summary: Day 2 develops communal identity through qiblah, defines righteousness through belief and character, and anchors Ramadan through fasting and dua. It closes with legal-ethical discipline and scenes of steadfastness, teaching that guidance requires obedience, patience, and trust in Allah.
themes: Identity in deen is shown by obedience and justice.
Ramadan worship is meant to produce taqwa and sincere dua.
Steadfastness in trials requires sabr, unity, and reliance on Allah.
